searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT C.PKID, C.CASE_CODE , C.ORG_ID, (SELECT MIN(AT.END_TIME_) FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'Guohu' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=W.INST_CODE) TRANSFERDATE, (SELECT MAX(AT.END_TIME_) FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'GuohuApprove' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=W.INST_CODE) CASETRANSFERDATE, V.LONG_ AS status, W.INST_CODE FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C INNER JOIN SCTRANS.T_TO_WORKFLOW W ON C.CASE_CODE = W.CASE_CODE AND W.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND W.STATUS IN (0, 4) INNER JOIN SCTRANS.ACT_HI_VARINST V ON V.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE AND V.NAME_=N'GuohuApprove' <!-- <if test="(transferDateStart != null and transferDateStart != '') or (transferDateEnd != null and transferDateEnd != '')"> INNER JOIN ( SELECT P1.PROC_INST_ID_ FROM ( SELECT AT.PROC_INST_ID_, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY AT.PROC_INST_ID_ ORDER BY AT.ID_ ASC) RANKID FROM SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'Guohu' <if test="transferDateStart != null and transferDateStart != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ >= #transferDateStart# </if> <if test="transferDateEnd != null and transferDateEnd != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ <= #transferDateEnd# </if> ) P1 WHERE P1.RANKID = 1 )TASKHISTORY1 ON TASKHISTORY1.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE </if>
<if test="(caseTransferDateStart != null and caseTransferDateStart != '') or (caseTransferDateEnd != null and caseTransferDateEnd != '')"> INNER JOIN ( SELECT P2.PROC_INST_ID_ FROM ( SELECT AT.PROC_INST_ID_, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY AT.PROC_INST_ID_ ORDER BY AT.ID_ DESC) RANKID FROM SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'GuohuApprove' <if test="caseTransferDateStart != null and caseTransferDateStart != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ >= #caseTransferDateStart# </if> <if test="caseTransferDateEnd != null and caseTransferDateEnd != '' "> AND AT.END_TIME_ <= #caseTransferDateEnd# </if> ) P2 WHERE P2.RANKID = 1 )TASKHISTORY2 ON TASKHISTORY2.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE </if> --> where 1=1
<if test="transferDateStart != null and transferDateStart !='' "> AND (SELECT MIN(AT.END_TIME_) FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'Guohu' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=W.INST_CODE) >= #transferDateStart# </if>
<if test="transferDateEnd != null and transferDateEnd !='' "> AND (SELECT MIN(AT.END_TIME_) FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'Guohu' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=W.INST_CODE) <= #transferDateEnd# </if>
<if test="caseTransferDateStart != null and caseTransferDateStart !='' "> AND (SELECT MAX(AT.END_TIME_) FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'GuohuApprove' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=W.INST_CODE) >= #caseTransferDateStart# </if>
<if test="caseTransferDateEnd != null and caseTransferDateEnd !='' "> AND (SELECT MAX(AT.END_TIME_) FROM SCTRANS.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_=N'GuohuApprove' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=W.INST_CODE) <= #caseTransferDateEnd# </if> <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr !='' "> AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO P WHERE C.CASE_CODE = P.CASE_CODE AND P.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%') </if> <if test="orgName != null and orgName != '' "> AND C.ORG_ID = #orgName# </if> <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != ''"> AND C.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </if> <if test="vrealName != null and vrealName != ''"> AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE_INFO I WHERE C.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE AND I.QJDS_NAME LIKE '%' + #vrealName# + '%' ) </if> <if test="managerName != null and managerName != ''"> AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB_ACTIVE UA WHERE UA.USER_ID = #managerName# AND JOB_CODE = 'Manager' AND UA.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID) </if> <if test="TransferStatus != null and TransferStatus != ''"> AND V.LONG_ = #TransferStatus# </if> <if test="jobCode != 'consultant'"> AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.V_YUCUI_ORG_HIERARCHY VYOH WHERE VYOH.ORG_ID =C.ORG_ID AND VYOH.TEAM_ID=#orgId# OR VYOH.DISTRICT_ID=#orgId# OR VYOH.hq_id=#orgId#) </if> <if test="jobCode == 'consultant'"> C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID=#userId# </if>

column.name: GRP_NAME,AR_NAME,WZ_NAME,QJDS_NAME,PROPERTY_ADDR,N_STATUS
column.title: 店组,片区,区域,区董,产证地址,是否审批通过
